cases.title: Economics Expert Witness Testifies in Wrongful Discharge Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Economics Expert Witness could testify on the value of company shares of stock in a wrongful termination case.

cases.title: Plaintiff's Psychology Expert Witness Prevented from Testifying in 42 U.S.C. 1983 Case
cases.description: A Psychology Expert Witness was excluded from testifying on use of force, restraints, and isolation against juvenile center detainees.

cases.title: Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Excluded in Hotel Ownership Dispute
cases.description: Defendant's Forensic Accounting Expert Witness was not allowed to testify in part because his opinions were not grounded in reliable principles.
